string-array.name: tips_sleep_content
string-array.item: The importance of getting enough quality sleep cannot be overstated.
Bright lights in the evening, it may disrupt your production of the sleep hormone melatonin.
A relaxing, routine activity right before bedtime to get sound and deep sleep or remain asleep.
Stick to a sleep schedule. This helps to regulate your body\'s clock and could help you fall asleep and stay asleep for the night.
Power napping may help you get through the day, but if you find that you can\'t fall asleep, eliminating even short catnaps may help.
Design your sleep environment to establish the conditions you need for sleep. Your bedroom should be cool.
Sleep on a comfortable mattress and pillows. Make sure your mattress is comfortable and supportive.
Use bright light to help manage your circadian rhythms. This will keep your circadian rhythms in check.
Avoid alcohol, cigarettes, and heavy meals in the evening. Alcohol, cigarettes and caffeine can disrupt sleep.
Eating big or spicy meals can cause discomfort from indigestion that can make it hard to sleep.
Your body needs time to shift into sleep mode, so spend the last hour before bed doing a calming activity such as reading.
If you have trouble sleeping, avoid electronics before bed or in the middle of the night.
If you can\'t sleep, go into another room and do something relaxing until you feel tired.
Go to bed early and get up early can make your feel more energetic in the next day.
Even though alcohol might make you feel sleepy, it can disrupt sleep later in the night.
Go to bed and get up at the same time every day.
Don\'t go to bed over hungry or over stuffed.
Do not sleep in the open air at night.
Regular physical activity can promote better sleep. Avoid being active too close to bedtime, however.
Create a room that\'s ideal for sleeping. Often, this means cool, dark and quiet.

string-array.name: tips_health_title
string-array.item: Use plenty of herbs and spices

string-array.name: tips_health_content
string-array.item: Even with healthier foods. Ingredients and nutrient content can vary a lot.
Compare nutrition information on package labels and select products.
To maintain a healthy weight, eat only as many calories as you use up through physical activity.
Often this is less than you are served, especially when eating out.
You\'ll have more control over ingredients and preparation methods.
Look for the Heart-Check mark to easily identify foods that can be part of an overall healthy eating pattern.
Healthy home cooking and smart shopping puts you in control of what goes into your recipes and your body.
How to Keep Track of What You Eat - Learn how to keep track of what you eat in order to lose weight or maintain a healthy weight.
So-called “superfoods” alone won’t make you healthier – but adding these nutritious foods to an already balanced diet can bring health benefits.
Eating healthy on a budget can be done! Being creative can help you stick to your budget and incorporate nutritious foods into your diet.
All too often, kids are rewarded with unhealthy foods and sugary drinks and desserts, but there are lots of healthy choices that taste great!
The number of meals you eat may not be so important. How you eat those meals is what matters most when it comes to lose weight.
Many shoppers assume organic products are more nutritious and safer to eat, but these perceptions are based more on hype than hard science.
Picky eaters can miss out on a lot of good food, they can also miss out on important nutrients found in foods often on the I-Don’t-Eat list.
While you may be familiar with brown rice and 100% whole wheat bread, there are lots of other tasty whole grain options.
Sugary drinks are among the most fattening items you can put into your body.
Despite being high in fat, nuts are incredibly nutritious and healthy.
These foods have been engineered to trigger your pleasure centers, so they trick your brain into overeating.
It’s high in antioxidants, and studies have linked coffee intake to longevity and a reduced risk of type 2 diabetes, and numerous other illnesses.
Fish is a great source of high-quality protein and healthy fat.
The bacteria in your gut, collectively called the gut microbiota, are incredibly important for overall health.
Drinking enough water can have numerous benefits. Surprisingly, it can boost the number of calories you burn.
Meat can be a nutritious and healthy part of your diet. It\'s very high in protein and contains various important nutrients.
If you don\'t get much sun exposure. Sunlight is a great source of vitamin D. Yet, most people don\'t get enough sun exposure.
Vegetables and fruits are loaded with prebiotic fiber, vitamins, minerals, and many antioxidants, some of which have potent biological effects.
Eating enough protein is vital for optimal health. What\'s more, this nutrient is particularly important for weight loss.
Doing aerobic exercise, also called cardio, is one of the best things you can do for your mental and physical health.
Extra virgin olive oil is one of the healthiest vegetable oils.
Added sugar is one of the worst ingredients in the modern diet, as large amounts can harm your metabolic health.
Not all carbs are created equal. Refined carbs have been highly processed to remove their fiber.
While saturated fat is true that saturated fat raises cholesterol levels, it also raises HDL (good) cholesterol and shrinks your LDL (bad) particles.
Lifting weights is one of the best things you can do to strengthen your muscles and improve your body composition.
Artificial trans fats are harmful, man-made fats that are strongly linked to inflammation and heart disease.
Many incredibly healthy herbs and spices exist.
Social relationships are incredibly important not only for your mental well-being but also your physical health.
The only way to know exactly how many calories you eat is to weigh your food and use a nutrition tracker.
If you have excess belly fat, get rid of it. Belly fat is particularly harmful.
Diets are notoriously ineffective and rarely work well in the long term.
Whole eggs are so nutritious that they’re often termed “nature\'s multivitamin.”
Take more vegetables and fruits; Take less candies and beverages; Stop eating junk food.
Drink at least eight glasses a day and walk at least 20 minutes a day. You will got to look this good at your age.
A light and less greasy diet is strongly recommended.
A recent study found that stretching is just as effective as yoga at decreasing back-pain.
Stretching of any kind, whether static or dynamic, can help improve flexibility and decrease back-pain risk and symptoms.
Traditional resistance training can improve strength and regain function, especially for everyday activities.
Studies found that people who practiced yoga had less back pain and more mobility than people who did other sports.
It\'s advised to exercise in the cool early morning or evening.
Remember never take too much cold food, fruit, and beverages.
Little appetite? sleep less? in low spirits? a one-hour nap after lunch is of great benefit to your health.
Maintaining a tranquil mood is of great importance for staying healthy .

string-array.name: pull_cool_content
string-array.item: Wenn die Temperatur des Telefons zu hoch ist, wirkt sich dies auf die Lebensdauer des Telefons aus. Es wird empfohlen sich abzukühlen!

string-array.name: pull_network_content
string-array.item: Optimieren Sie die Netzwerkbedingungen und verabschieden Sie sich von Netzwerkproblemen!

string-array.name: tips_battery_content
string-array.item: Die Standby-Zeit verlängert sich um %1$d Minuten.
